701967f-b.title: Bronx: Broadway - 252nd Street (West)

Van Cortlandt Park (BronxJ: The park's recreation
field, viewing south from Broadway (right), at West 252nd
Street. View 2 is in a northerly direction from West 252nd
Street.
April 24, 1937

700372f-a.title: Bronx: 252nd Street (West) - Broadway
700372f-a.text:
MAVE HILL 675 eet 252nd Street, Riverdale, oronx. Jult in
late Yederal style for .iillias Lewis orris about 1833,
this three-story country house of local fieldstone has a
decidedly Inglish atmosphere. Among .ave Hill's fanous
residents were Iheodore Roosevelt, Hark Iwain and Arturo
Toscanini. Suests in the house have included Ihackeray,
Herbert Spencer, Ihomas Huxley and .ueen Rother Slizabeth.
